Title: Feeding Time
Description:
<The serpent darts forward and bites your fingers.>

Ouch! It seems, without a doubt, that the little beast is hungry. You recall that some meaty-looking turtles can be found on the wild cloud serpent island to the northeast.

Perhaps some turtle meat will fill the hatchling's voracious appetite.
ObjectivesText: Collect 3 Saltback Meat and feed them to your hatchling companion.
